scripts.prepare-gh-pages: rm -rf gh-pages-public && mkdir gh-pages-public && for dir in projects/*; do if [ -d "$dir/dist" ]; then cp -r $dir/dist gh-pages-public/$(basename $dir); elif [ -d "$dir/out" ]; then cp -r $dir/out gh-pages-public/$(basename $dir); fi; done && node scripts/generate-index.js
